movie.title: The Lovely Bones
movie.plot: A 14-year-old girl in suburban 1970's Pennsylvania is murdered by her neighbor. She tells the story from the place between Heaven and Earth, showing the lives of the people around her and how they have changed all while attempting to get someone to find her lost body.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 45 nominations.
